head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HAUPTMAN, JULIUS L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HAUPTMAN, JULIUS L.

block.p: HAUPTMAN--Julius L. August 2, 2003. Husband, father, grandfather, mentor and friend. Long standing and esteemed member of the Brookyn legal community. Father of the late Melvin Hauptman. Leaves surviving his beloved wife Goldie, daughter Evelyn, son-in-law George Constable, five grandchildren and one greatgrandchild. He will be missed.

Leaves surviving his beloved wife Goldie, daughter Evelyn, son-in-law George Constable, five grandchildren and one greatgrandchild. He will be missed.
